Description: Open-work green glazed composition naoform amulet decorated at the front with a sa-sign over a pylon, at the sides with winged uraei and at the back with a representation of a Ptah-Tatenen; at the top is a cornice of uraei(chipped) and a pierced suspension ring.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.97
